column4: speaking of vbox...when I use the "right Ctl" button i cant seem to ever switch back and forth between vbox and windows...once ive went to devices and shared my usb key/mouse it cant get it back to windows
did you install guest additions?
yep
yep, should I have not?
no. it is good. you want it installed.
you mean the guest add on for usb 2.0 support?
yeah, it does other stuff also. display wise.
I just specified the filters for my mouse and keyboard
he wanted to know how to copy into his current dir
this is a good webpage for blank screen problems.   https://wiki.ubuntu.com/X/Troubleshooting/BlankScreen
thanks, elik did you see theify's link
what about system - prefs - appearance and killing it on that last tab - visual effects
did you install guest additions in the vm?
yes for usb 2.0 support
then i would think you do not need to hit a button to move your mouse out of the vm.   i don't...
i have a feeling my filters arent added right or something, dont know
under 'usb' do you just have it enabled
i don't need a filter to use the mouse.. it just works.
ok if i reboot its because i got stuck in vbox
yeah, i have both checkboxes in there checked.
ive tried multiple configs...can you tell me what you have checked off under usb
yeah, i have both checkboxes in there checked.   and nothing in the 'filters' area. it's blank.
thanks
